title: 08/24/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 08/24/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's preseason matchup between the Jags and Saints. Who should start at QB for each team? Is Trevor Lawrence ready to be an NFL starting quarterback? ESPN's National College Football Reporter discusses where Notre Dame may end up with College Football's continued conference realignment. And Hall of Famer Cris Carter the evolution of the Wide Receiver position and which numbers should be needed to get into the Hall of Fame.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
